definition: abbr. for 全國運動會|全国运动会[Quan2 guo2 Yun4 dong4 hui4]
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: These days the 11th National Games are the hottest TV shows.
sentences.chinese: 這些天11屆全運會是最熱門的電視節目了。

sentences.english: With the Games, the National Games in China is also a grand event.
sentences.chinese: 同奧運會一樣，全運會在中國也是一項盛大的賽事。

sentences.english: The National Games attracted many athletes and reporters from throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 本屆全運會吸引了來自全國各地的運動員和記者。

sentences.english: Shandong is the host of the 11th National Games.
sentences.chinese: 山東是11屆全運會的東道主。

definition: National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
the right to host (an international meeting)

pinyin: Nei4 zheng4 bu4 Jing3 zheng4 shu3

definition: to substitute/to complement in the proper order/to fill vacancies progressively
everyone present applauds/universal acclaim/a standing ovation/to bring the house down
UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
